input_text.Prompt:
Given a item name and item keywords, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item name:
Majestic Stephen Curry Golden State Warriors Mens Blue Jersey Name and Number Hoodie

Item keywords:
Screen Printed Graphics
Comfortable Fit
Bright Team Colors
Officially Licensed by National Basketball Association
80% Cotton/20% Polyester
input_text.Response A: This magnificent Majestic Stephen Curry Golden State Warriors Men's Blue Jersey Name and Number Hoodie is the perfect way to show your team spirit and support for your favorite player. Made with 80% cotton and 20% polyester, this comfortable fit hoodie is perfect for everyday wear. The bright team colors and screen-printed graphics make this hoodie a great way to show your team pride, while the officially licensed by National Basketball Association designation ensures that you are getting a high-quality product. Whether you're wearing it to a game or just showing off your team spirit, this hoodie is sure to impress.
input_text.Response B:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! Here's a possible product description for the Majestic Stephen Curry Golden State Warriors Mens Blue Jersey Name and Number Hoodie:

"Step up your game and show off your fandom with this Majestic Stephen Curry Golden State Warriors Mens Blue Jersey Name and Number Hoodie! 🏀🔥

This hoodie features screen printed graphics of your favorite player's name and number, along with bright team colors that will make you stand out from the crowd. 💪 Made from a comfortable blend of 80% cotton and 20% polyester, this hoodie is perfect for cheering on the Warriors from the stands or just hanging out with fellow fans. 💫

Officially licensed by the National Basketball Association (NBA), this hoodie is a must-have for any true Warriors fan. 🏆 So why wait? Get your hands on this amazing hoodie today and show off your team spirit in style! 💪🏆"

I hope this product description meets your requirements! Please let me know if there's anything else I can help with. 😊

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
